name: PoueGO
description:
Do you have what it takes to help the PoueGo hen rescue the eggs stolen by the evil fox?

Run, dodge obstacles, collect all the eggs and unlock new levels until you rescue all your future chicks.

PoueGo combines fun and skill to solve each level, remember that you have limited movements to reach the golden egg that allows you to advance in level and also hidden eggs that you must find to collect all the eggs that will take you to the final level!
